Package edu.rit.io

Package edu.rit.io contains components for input/output.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Streamable
    Interface Streamable specifies the interface for an object that can be written to an output stream by class OutStream or read from an input stream by class InStream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextObjectInputStream
    Class ContextObjectInputStream is an ObjectInputStream that uses the calling thread's context class loader to load classes.
    ExternalMap<K,V>
    Class ExternalMap provides a mapping from keys to values, where the keys and values are stored in an external file.
    FileResource
    Class FileResource encapsulates a file stored as a resource in the Java class path.
    Files
    Class Files provides static methods for various file related operations.
    InStream
    Class InStream provides an object that reads primitive data types, strings, objects, and arrays in binary form from an underlying input stream.
    OutStream
    Class OutStream provides an object that writes primitive data types, strings, objects, and arrays in binary form to an underlying output stream.
    Stdio
    Class Stdio provides standard I/O streams that can be redirected on a per-thread basis.
    ThreadedOutputStream
    Class ThreadedOutputStream provides an object that automatically synchronizes multiple threads writing to an underlying output stream.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeserializeException
    Class DeserializeException indicates that an InStream method failed to deserialize an object.
    IllegalDataException
    Class IllegalDataException indicates that an InStream method read illegal data.

Package edu.rit.io Description

Package edu.rit.io contains components for input/output.
